messages.body:
Mr.JOHN SMITH 
 FOREIGN REMITTANCE DEPT. 
 UNION BANK. 
 ATTN: 
 
 My name is MR.JOHN SMITH  of credit and foreign
 bills of Union bank Plc. I am writing in respect of
 a foreign customer of my bank with account
 number14-255-2004/utb/t who perished in a plane
 crash  with thewhole
 passengers aboard on August6,1997.Since the demise
 of this our customer by name Barry Kelly I
 personally has watched with keen interest to see the
 next of kin but all has proved abortive as none has
 come to claim his funds of usd.15.5M, 
 which has been with my branch for a verylong time.
 On this note, I decided to seek for whom his name
 shall be used as the next of kin as no one has come
 up to be the next of kin.And the banking ethics here
 does not allow such money to stay more than five
 years, because money will be recalled to the bank
 treasury as unclaimed after this period. 
 
 In view of this I got your contact through a trade
 journal after realizing that your name and country
 is similar to the deceased. I will give you 30% of
 the total.Upon the receipt of your response, I will
 send you by fax or e-mail the application, bank's
 fax number and the next step to take. I will not
 fail to bring to your notice that this business is
 hitch free and that you should not entertain any
 fear as all modalities for fund transfer can be
 finalized with in five banking days, after you apply
 to the bank as a relation to the deceased.
 
 When you receive this letter.Kindly send me an
 e-mail signifying your interest including your
 private Tel/Fax numbers for quick communication. 
 Yours faithfully, 
 
 please get back to me on this my privat:email
 johnsmith2005_2008@yahoo.co.uk
 
 Best Regards. 
 
 Mr.JOHN SMITH
messages.raw:
JOHN SMITH

ATTN:

My name is MR.JOHN SMITH of credit and foreign bills of Union bank Plc. I am writing in respect of a foreign customer of my bank with account number14-255-2004/utb/t who perished in a plane crash [Korean Air Flight 801] with thewhole passengers aboard on August6,1997.Since the demise of this our customer by name Barry Kelly I personally has watched with keen interest to see the next of kin but all has proved abortive as none has come to claim his funds of usd.15.5M, [Fifteen million five hundred thousand united states dollars] which has been with my branch for a verylong time. On this note, I decided to seek for whom his name shall be used as the next of kin as no one has come up to be the next of kin.And the banking ethics here does not allow such money to stay more than five years, because money will be recalled to the bank treasury as unclaimed after this period.

In view of this I got your contact through a trade journal after realizing that your name and country is similar to the deceased. I will give you 30% of the total.Upon the receipt of your response, I will send you by fax or e-mail the application, bank's fax number and the next step to take. I will not fail to bring to your notice that this business is hitch free and that you should not entertain any fear as all modalities for fund transfer can be finalized with in five banking days, after you apply to the bank as a relation to the deceased.

When you receive this letter.Kindly send me an e-mail signifying your interest including your private Tel/Fax numbers for quick communication.
Yours faithfully,

please get back to me on this my privat:email johnsmith2005_2008@yahoo.co.uk

Best Regards.
Mr.JOHN SMITH

[Your basic Dead Bank Customer letter. Barry Kelly is one of the Deadest, as a stroll through that page will show.]

messages.body:
Dear Phil,
  
 Thanks for your mail and your wilingness to assist
 me in this very transaction. I can assure you that
 this transaction will be handled under a legitimate
 arrangement that will protect you from any britge of
 law.
  
 I have all the necessary document to proove this
 transaction which will be sent to you for your
 perusal and understanding. But before that i will
 require from you the bellow information in as to
 start the processing of the approval for the release
  of the fund into your nominated bank account.
  
 1. Your full names
 2. Mailing address
 3. Private phone and fax numbers
 4. Age and occupation
  
 As soon as i receive the above information from you
 i shall send you the necessary document and also
 apoint an attorney that will handle the sworning of
 an a affidavit of true beneficary on your name at
 the federal high court of justice to prove that you
 are the rightfull next of kin/beneficiary to the
 decease.
 I look forward to hear from you.
  
 Regards,
 Mr John Smith

messages.body:
Sir Smith

Glad to hear it. I trust you will tell the bank to be
prompt with matters.

If I seemed short in my last email it is because my
mechanic, Ryu Hayabusa, snagged his hand in the
alernator belt while adjusting the timing. Damn fool
lost three fingers. I was horrified - I had to have
the engine steam cleaned again. He has been fired for
his incompetence.

Go Smith!!
Phil





Date: Sat, 10 Sep 2005 


Sirs

It is an honour to serve with esteemed baiting folk.
The Abachae deserved everything they got. I hope Mr
Lewd has sorted out the problem with the sasquatch.

So far little has happened with this Smith fellow. He
has just sent me his (no doubt) risible looking
paperwork which I will inspect and forward to
youselves.

Find below the lads initial email to me for your
perusal.

I am currently operating, as ever, as a racing driver
in Japan.

Love and peace,
Phil

messages.body:
Sir

Thank you for your email.

Yes, my brother was a great, great man. He was a
tremendous driver, he was champion of dominos in his
local, The Robbing Hood, and he was a terrific lover.

Regarding the plethora of documentation that you
require: I'm sure I can get half of what you need, but
I cannot provide you with my passport (it has been
confiscated), or my birth certificate as my dog ate
it. I do have a scan of my drivers license though, if
that is any good to you?

Once again I thank you for your support.

Love and peace,
Phil

messages.body:
Captain Smith

Thanks for your email.

Let it be known to your goodself that the bank have
kindly acknowleged me as Kelly's brother (even though
I am Japanese and he sounds most likely Irish).

I am concerned that the bank have asked for the
following:

(A) COPY OF DEPOSIT CERTIFICATE OF THE SAID FUND OR

messages.body:
I apologise for my ferocity. I am coming down from my
morphine high and I am starting to ache. 

Coupled with this, one of my mechanics, Beatu Kitano,
was fitting a mis-firing system to my exhaust and the
ramp gave way and crushed his skull. It was terrible -
he was wearing a new uniform which is now ruined. I
intend to sue his family for the inconvenience.

I do expect an answer as to why you have largely
ignored Mikhail for a week when you could have been
making money. Send Mikhail an invoice and business
will progress.

God bless you, and all who sail in you
Phil

Salmon

without them I would have perished when that stupid
badger landed on my car.

Phil

find you and I will shove a cylinder-head gasket down

messages.body:
ATTENTION SLOMAN

You are in no position to preach business etiquette.

WE KEEP ON SPEAKING WITH YOU GENTLY AND HONOURABLY

So telling someone to "fuck off" is a noble and decent
thing to do around your area is it? Well it's not
here, if you said that to my face I would have
executed a triple-hit dragon punch on you. You'd be a
bloody mess, believe me.

Until you apologise for your outrageous language and
behavior, Mikhail will remain off his leash.

As I have repeatedly told you, I am your customer. YOU
need to show ME some respect. You can start by putting
a lid on your venomous attitude and general idiocy and
start helping me for once.

Good god man, if you ran a bank like this in Japan you
would have been sliced asunder.

Stop complaining and do your job, and start treating
me for what I am - a customer with millions of money
in your two-bit shack of a bank. 

Quite what my brother was thinking when he opened an
account with you, I've no idea....

In the meanwhile you will continue to deal with
Mikhail.

Ynerghn,
Phil

Mr Cletus Okoro

Phil

messages.body:
Mr Smith

Thank you for your email

Congratulations on your national celebration of
independend. May you drink lots of alcohol and have
sex with everything that you see.

I am glad to hear you've managed to get the documents
together - it is good that someone is finally making
headway in this tangled mess of a transaction.

That foolish barrister has not done a thing for us
yet. Mikhail is trying to make sense of Okororo's
whacky emails but it is slow progress.

Let me know when you are visiting Japan, and also what
kind of car you require. I look forward to teaching
you drift techniques. Have you had much experience in
downhill street racing? If not I recommend maybe a
Nissan S13 or a Toyota Levin AE85, just to get the
feel for powersliding. Please state your preference.

God bless your little cotton socks,
Phil

were you thinking of living? Tokyo is the most
expensive city on earth, you will need all of Kelly's
funds just to buy a pot of Ramen cup noodles.

show an understanding of Japanese culture and history.

write an essay - around 4500 words - on Lord Oda
Nobunaga, particularly his thinking and strategies
behind his attack on Okehazama in 1560.

I hope to race you soon

Phil

messages.body:
Cletus

You are without a doubt the most obtuse and unusual
"lawyer" I have ever encountered.

You are NOT calling the shots here - *I* am the one
with the money. I am dangling the carrot. If you want
paying then you do as instructed! That is how the
world works. It is unfortunate that in the World Of
Cletus things seem to be different, but that will not
wash with me.

I cannot be bothered explaining everything to you
again, trying to get through to you is like trying to
teach inertia principals to a 3 year old. Maybe if I
had a blackboard and a chalk there I could draw you a
little picture to show you how business is done, but
you would proabably need another diagram to explain
the first one.

I'm not an artist Mr Okoror. I am a racing driver and
I am claiming what is mine. I thought that YOU might
be able to help and that you would want to earn some
money. Clearly this is not the case.

I have therefore tuned the engine of this deal for
you: send the documents to Mikhail prior to payment or
you are fired. 

I hope this sobers you into action at last.

May rain dung on your newly cleaned car,
Phil

I love you,
Phil

messages.body:
Mr Cletus

At last you are sounding like a reasonable man.

Upon receipt of your picture (with car) and the list of places to visit that your boy is getting for us, I will instruct Mikhail to wire you $1000 immediately.

I have never heard of Western Union, I do not think there are too many of them in Japan. As for Russia, I am not sure if there is one near to Mikhail - Russia is a pretty damn big country. The alternative is Advanced Remuneration System Enablement which Mikhail can use to forward the money to you.

I hope we can do business.

Have you had any thought about the process of beginning legal proceedings against John Smith? Surely even in Nigerai, the threat to kill someone is illegal? That being the case I would like to prosecute him, either to claim compensation from him or to give him a custodial sentence. As a barrister I would appreciate your advice. Naturally you will be paid for this.

Regards,
Phil

messages.body:
I am fine, no thanks to you.

Walking through Niigata last month, I found myself in one of the more seedy districts. As I walked along one of the alleyways I noticed a foul-smelling African shuffling towards me, moaning about something. Without warning he attacked me with the syringe he had just used to fill his veins with smack! It was John Smith! He recognised me from my driving license picture! He had flown to Japan to cary out his promise to kill me!

Easily avoiding his clumsy, hazed attack, I punched him in his chest, breaking two ribs. I then knocked him to the floor and stabbed him in his eyes with his own needle. Finding my knife in my pocket, I then removed one of his feet so that he could not follow me, and chucked it into a nearby trash recepticle. I kicked him in the balls a few times and walked off, at which point I was arrested.

Fortunately I had some of my Yakuza friends "persuade" the cops to release me.

So I do not need to prosecute John Smith any longer, justice has been exacted - he is now blind and crippled for life.

What can I do for you Clitus?

messages.body:
Cletus

Your email, despite it's obvious hilarity, means nothing.

How dare you be so rude!

The money is still safely in Sodomon's bank. You can have it if you like. I would not consider "that huge sume of million dolars" worthy to wipe the oil from my workshop floor. I have spent more money on Magic Trees than the amount that currently sits in that bank account.

"iknow you are a concetuos man" - despite my years learning the English language, I have never encountered such a phrase. Please explain so I can use it in future conversations.

As for my greed, well sir if I am greedy then you are the stingiest miser of a pauper I have ever come across. You could not even foot the bill for whatever wooden shack of a hovel passes for a hotel in your town.

I entered into this deal with the sole aim of helping John Smith, but then I discovered his drug addiction and he threatened to kill myself and Mikhail. As you know, he is now in terrible shape - that's what you get for fulking with Phil Munglers.

Phil
